com.sociam.android.model

Class SendMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sociam.android.model.SendMessage

  • public class SendMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the model of a new message.

    When the user open MessageActivity, this class will be instanciated. This contains all information of a new message. If the user won't send the message the object will be discard.

    Version:
    1
    Author:
    yukki
